comments.text:
Created attachment 544989
testcase.

Hi,
I've a svg with big coordinates (ie: about 8500000 px) drawn inside a div with opposing left (about -8500000 px). Svg should be displayed but is not.

In attached testcase, a vertical line should be displayed but it is not. You can make it appear by zooming out.
Note, than when applying a smaller shift (ie: using -6500000px, 6500500 and 6500500 instead of -8500000px, 8500500 and 8500500), line is correctly displayed.

For reference, the OpenLayers bug where it is discussed:
http://trac.osgeo.org/openlayers/ticket/3359
comments.raw_text:
Hi,
I've a svg with big coordinates (ie: about 8500000 px) drawn inside a div with opposing left (about -8500000 px). Svg should be displayed but is not.

In attached testcase, a vertical line should be displayed but it is not. You can make it appear by zooming out.
Note, than when applying a smaller shift (ie: using -6500000px, 6500500 and 6500500 instead of -8500000px, 8500500 and 8500500), line is correctly displayed.

For reference, the OpenLayers bug where it is discussed:
http://trac.osgeo.org/openlayers/ticket/3359
